title: Contact
headline: Welcome on board, traveller!
section1: Do you have questions? Advices to share? Or just few words for us?
section2: Feel free to send us a message, it will be our pleasure to talk with you. ❤️

section3.part1: You can also comment right after any article, if this is about a country that we already visited. Feel free to reach us out on

form.name: Name
form.valid: Your message has been sent successfully.
form.invalid: Unfortunately, an error was encountered while sending your message.
